Description: On US-13 North in the City of Virginia Beach, at Chesapeake Bay Bridge Tunnel North, motorists can expect delays due to high wind.

Description: On Rt. 663 East in the County of Pulaski, in the vicinity of Beach Dr; Holly Dr; Rt. 757N/S (Pulaski County), motorists can expect delays due to weather.
